Headline: #171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park Temporary Eastbound  Reroute near University/56th
ShortDescription: Eastbound #171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park buses are temporarily rerouted via 56th, Woodlawn and 55th due to, street blockage near University/56th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park buses are temporarily rerouted via 56th, Woodlawn and 55th due to, street blockage near University/56th

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
